sentences.en: As a result, this passage will epitomize and introduce some main viewpoints.
sentences.cn: 研究者对于情绪智力诸多方面如概念,测量等持有不同观点, 本文将摘要简介.

sentences.en: Epitomize the general idea , the depict way of the text.
sentences.cn: 概括本文的大意和描写方法.

sentences.en: Rising and falling in sinuous curves, epitomize the beauty and solitude of the Southwest's unspoiled lands.
sentences.cn: 在蜿蜒的曲线中起伏不定, 沙岩结构成为了西南部这片未损坏的陆地美丽与孤寂的缩影.

sentences.en: The relationship of Turco - German epitomize on Baghdad Railways built.
sentences.cn: 德国与奥斯曼帝国之间的交往和关系,集中表现在巴格达铁路的修筑上.

sentences.en: The Summer Season could be said to epitomize all that is traditionally English about England.
sentences.cn: 英格兰夏日是传统英格兰的缩影,要想定义它,的确是件难事.

sentences.en: This building epitomizes the spirit of the nineteenth century.
sentences.cn: 这栋建筑体现了19世纪的时代精神。

sentences.en: Though clumsy on land Arctocephalus pusillus , or Cape fur seals, epitomize grace underwater.
sentences.cn: 虽然海豹在陆地上是笨拙的, 但是在水底下是优美的.

sentences.en: Wrestling The System -- Plushenko and Weir epitomize the new style of skating.
sentences.cn: 与“规则”教劲 -- 普鲁申科与威尔,成为花样滑冰新风格的缩影.

trans.tran_en: to be a very typical example of something

trans.tran_cn: 作…的摘要，成为…的缩影，概括，集中体现
